profile.title: Kōtaha Kaiwhakamahi
profile.mustLogin: Me takiuru koe kia kite ai i ngā tautuhinga.
profile.showOriginalWithTranslation: Whakaatu i te taketake me te whakamāoritanga
profile.filterExplicit: Tātari i ngā ihirangi kāre e tika ana
profile.allowExplicitContent: Tukua ngā ihirangi kāre e tika ana
profile.saveError: Hapa: Kāore i taea te tiaki ngā tautuhinga
profile.noPrivateKey: Kāore he kī tūmataiti i tēnei pūrere hei kaweake.
profile.setBackupPassword: Whakatakotoria he kupuhipa hei whakamuna i tō tārua:
profile.enterBackupPassword: Tāurutia te kupuhipa mō tēnei tārua:
profile.importSuccess: Kua kawemai te kī tūmataiti ki tēnei pūrere.
profile.importFailed: I rahua te kawemai kī (kupuhipa hē, kōnae pakaru rānei).
profile.keysRotated: Kua hangaia he takirua kī hou, kua tukuna te kī tūmatanui.
profile.keyDisclaimer: Kāore tō kī tūmataiti e wehe i tēnei pūrere. Kaweake he tārua kua whakamuna kia taea te whakahoki ki tētahi atu pūrere.
profile.callTextForwardingTitle: Tuku Waea me/kāore rānei he Kupu
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Tukua ngā waea me ngā karere kuputuhi e tae mai ana ki tō waea, īmēra rānei kua manatoko. Ka taea e ngā waea/kupu puta te whakaatu i tō tau Chatforia.
profile.forwardTextsToPhone: Tukua ngā karere kuputuhi ki te waea
profile.forwardTextsToEmail: Tukua ngā karere kuputuhi ki te īmēra

chat.selectPrompt: Kōwhiria he karere, he rūma kōrerorero rānei hei tīmata kōrero
